      • getAaptOverride

        public Optional<Path> getAaptOverride()
        Returns the path to the platform specific aapt executable that is overridden by the current project. If not specified, the Android platform aapt will be used.

      • getAapt2Override

        public Optional<Path> getAapt2Override()
        Returns the path to the platform specific aapt2 executable that is overridden by the current project. If not specified, the Android platform aapt will be used.
